summary: The Veterans Health Administration is facing challenges recruiting and retaining clinical staff, such as physicians and registered nurses. We've found that VHA has high attrition among HR staff and weak internal control processes, which are contributing to its staffing issues. These challenges are making it more difficult for VHA to meet the health care needs of our nation's veterans. We recommended in our reports (on...
title: Veterans Health Administration: Actions Needed to Better Recruit and Retain Clinical and Administrative Staff
